column2: Anbang's Starwood bid is major Chinese prize for Taubman's PJT March 18 When Anbang Insurance Group acquired New York's Waldorf Astoria Hotel last year
column3: the Chinese company gained more than one of the city's most iconic buildings. It got a base on Park Avenue across from the office of veteran dealmaker Paul Taubman.
